items.preText: Maan: "Poor approch from bangladesh.. got a good start and ruined by a little madness by lefty .. need to negotiate mujeeb and rashid with singles and doubles.. target other bowlers then" Sounds like a plan
items.text: angled into the pads, worked straight to midwicket with the pace
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

items.text: nice inswing from outside off, doesn't let Liton free his arms and he defends it to point
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

items.text: he targets the stumps, Liton watches carefully and defends with a straight bat
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

items.text: sharp movement to bring the ball into Liton again, Liton gets bat on it just in time
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run

items.text: sharp inswing again, loud appeal and he's been given! Liton is a bit unsure and he's gone for the review after consulting Shakib. Length delivery outside off, comes in, hits the front pad right in front of off and middle and looks like the second noise was of bat hitting the pad, not the inside edge. Ball-trcking says it's hitting and Liton walks off. The batsman would have reviewed straightaway had it been an inside edge, this was plumb and Bangladesh's only review is gone in the fifth over
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, OUT

dismissal.text: Liton Das lbw b Aftab Alam 6 (14b 0x4 0x6) SR: 42.85

items.preText: Another left-hander comes out - it's Mominul. One slip in place and Aftab Alam goes around the wicket
items.text: angles it in towards Mominul who defends it with a solid defence
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mominul Haque, no run

items.text: bit of loop for the ball on middle, he defends it to leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: too full outside off and Shakib drives it straight to cover
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: bit wider and he makes Shakib drive again with the length, he finds cover point this time
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: more towards middle and leg, Shakib works it to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: not much room, pretty straight on length and Shakib pushes the ball back
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: inside edge as Shakib pushes the ball away from the body, it stays low and deflects off Shahzad's pads to first slip
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: pretty short and wide outside off, Mominul pushes it back to the bowler tentatively with a horizontal bat
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mominul Haque, no run

items.text: still short and wide, he hardly uses his feet and helps it to cover point this time
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mominul Haque, no run

items.text: 16th dot ball in a row, this one is headed towards the stumps and Mominul defends with soft hands
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mominul Haque, no run

items.text: angled across from outside off, Mominul opens up a bit and plays across the line and gets an inside edge to the leg side behind square. Off the mark on his fifth ball
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Mominul Haque, 1 run

items.text: too full and Shakib drives it down, but straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: slow full toss on the pads, he can't get it away and finds midwicket
items.postText: The Bangladesh batsmen are looking tentative even against some loose deliveries
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Aftab Alam walks off, probably for some hydration and change his t-shirt
items.text: slightly full and Mominul helps the ball to leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mominul Haque, no run

items.text: turning into the batsman from a much shorter length, he gets the time to go back and whip it to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mominul Haque, 1 run

items.preText: Amol Aggarwal: "Afghan side looks threatening already. Ticking all boxes- runs (defendable), fielding and bowling. Won't be surprised if they go onto lift the cup."
items.text: better length for the ball coming in, Shakib goes back and defends it just in time
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: turning in from wide outside off, he punches it down to long off
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: this one straightens after pitching and Mominul goes back to work it to leg with the wrists
items.postText: The umpire has a word with Mujeeb about running on the pitch
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mominul Haque, no run

items.text: some width outside off and he stays back to steer it to point
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mominul Haque, no run

items.preText: Time for Gulbadin Naib, with a slip
items.text: starts with a middle and leg line, Shakib nudges the ball to leg behind square for one
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
